extraction.title: ServiceBroker.java line 728
extraction.description: There's a lot more information about this crash on crashlytics.com: https://fabric.io/owntracks/android/apps/org.owntracks.android/issues/551162c65141dcfd8f38881c
extraction.comments: More details please? Found out, that one can at least share the deatails. See http://crashes.to/s/b55a781db4c i'm taking this one. The changes require quite some logical changes in queueing behaviour.
